name: .FTW File Extension
summary: Learn about .FTW files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: File created by Family Tree Maker, a genealogy tracing program; contains family tree data used by Family Tree Maker, a genealogy program that allows you to build and share your family tree with others; also contains user settings and other information.

content: To create the FTW file, simply select File â†’ Save As..., name the file, verify that the selected file type is FTW, choose the save location, and click Save.
NOTE: Family Tree Maker was originally developed by MyFamily.com. It is now available through Ancestry.com, which is part of the Generations Network.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
